title: sometimes it directly hurts to look at when all previous bad acting is put someone to shame by this movie's actors.
review: The idea is to place most actors, blood and action in the movie. A movie full of some of the most famous actors in action movies. most of these actors were never known to be skilled and somehow it is all much worse in this movie. First part of the movie feels just like a joke. The movie is quite entertaining.
